entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -45.8°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
